title: With 8,000 QOMs, this Strava-Crusher is the Best Women’s Climber You’ve Never Heard Of
content:
California-raised Welsh cyclist Illi Gardner could be the world's best pure climber and she's not racing on a WorldTour team: 'I just love with going up mountains.'

Read the full article at With 8,000 QOMs, this Strava-Crusher is the Best Women’s Climber You’ve Never Heard Of on Velo.
author: ahood
